description.p: Unofficial desktop application for Notion, built as an Electron wrapper with additional features. Fully functional clients for Notion Calendar and Notion Mail included as dedicated tabs.

ul.li: Integrated Notion Tools — Fully functional dedicated tabs for Notion Calendar and Notion Mail within the same application. This approach saves system memory by reusing a single Electron process compared to running separate clients.
Theme Support — Switch effortlessly between light and dark UI themes.
Tray Icon — Minimize the application to the system tray for quick access. For environments without the tray like Gnome, there are actions available to access app options and updates.
Performance Tweaks — Optimized to reduce startup time for faster access.
Browser-Like Tabs — Tabs behave just like in a web browser: each has its own history, can be reordered, pinned, or even dragged from Notion Electron to your browser.
Fixed visual bug when Chromium window do not respect system-wide color scheme (issue #1)
Fixed bug when multiple tabs would not re-open on application start (issue #44)
Fixed application icon not applying in some desktop environments
Added actions (Options, Updates, About) in Activities screen for Gnome desktop environment
